detail_desc: Headband in a soft knit containing some wool and mohair.
Lace hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Knitted dress for a dog with pompoms on the back and ribbed flounces at the hem. Ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button,side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, fleece-lined hood and fleece-lined front pockets. Ribbing at the cuffs, narrow ribbing at the hem and reflective details. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
All-in-one suit in soft pile with a hood, decorative ears, long sleeves and long legs. Zip at the front that continues down one leg, foldover mitts at the cuffs and full feet. Jersey lining.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a fake fly and decorative button at the front. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Handbag in imitation leather with embroidery and appliqués on the front, two handles and a zip with a faux fur pompom at the top. Lined. Size 10.5x15x21 cm.

T-shirt dress in hard washed jersey made from a soft viscose and cotton blend with a wide neckline, short sleeves and twisted ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Visible seam centre back and a rounded hem.
Straight T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front. Round neck with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Cropped top in a cotton knit with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and scalloped hem.

Short, A-line dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Long puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. V-neck underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow shoulder straps.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a gentle V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with lace.
Briefs in organic cotton with a low, V-shaped waist with a lace trim, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft knit. Hat with a pompom on the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a printed front and round neckline with a narrow trim.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with a collar and drawstring, and a zip at the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, rib-knit cotton with a stand-up collar and zip down the front.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Suede trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, zip at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Sole 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a wrapover drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short V-neck dress in a crêpe weave with double-layered flutter sleeves that fall in soft pleats over the shoulders. Elasticated seam at the waist with narrow ties at the sides. Lined.
Sleep mask in faux fur with appliqués and an elastic strap at the back. Jersey lining.
Clamdiggers in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Patch front pockets, flap back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.
Short-sleeved top in a modal and cotton blend with gathers on one shoulder and a draped front with a tie at the hem.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist, wide waist panel and open pocket on one leg.
Straight-cut coat with a soft, brushed finish, narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned weave with pleats and a concealed zip in the side. Inner skirt.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
Hat in a sturdy, rib-knit cotton blend with a wide turned-up hem.
Wide suit trousers in sturdy twill with pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery text print. Decorative tie detail at the hem.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with pleats and buttons at the cuffs. Seam and a detachable D-ring belt at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved shirt in wide-wale corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Fixed hood with ear appliqués on top and a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Mitts and feet that can be folded over to keep the hands and feet warm. Lined. The polyester content of the suit is recycled.
Dungarees in washed denim with hard-worn details and adjustable straps with a metal fastener. Chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and wide, straight legs.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace yoke.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.

Shirt in softly draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, a seam with a drawstring under the bust and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem.

Running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at one hip, reflective details, and legs with ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees and a zip at the hems.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top both front and back.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede sides, two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Imitation suede inside. Size approx. 7.5x27x33 cm.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with smocking around the neckline and long sleeves with smocked cuffs. Concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Flat cap in a woven wool blend. Cotton lining.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and wide, straight legs.
Top in stretch, ribbed jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a square neckline, long puff sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and slim legs.

Blouse and a pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Sleeveless, crinkled blouse with a decorative frill at the top and buttons down the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist, decorative bow, fake pockets and elasticated hems.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short jacket in cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and discreet side pockets. Long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with lace at the top, a boat neck and short cap sleeves. Satin lining at the top with support panels, a concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and pleated skirt. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in sequined mesh with ribbing around the neckline, short sleeves and appliqués front and back. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.

Cargo trousers in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side, back and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud. Zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and an elasticated drawstring at the hems.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a detachable hood and sleeves in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, pockets in the side seams and ribbed cuffs.
Cold shoulder top in soft jersey with short sleeves that have a decorative tie detail.
Slingback ballet pumps in imitation suede with pointed toes and a scalloped edge. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a jacquard-knit cotton blend.
Satin-covered Alice band with faux fur pompoms at the top.
